page.title: 07COAL MINING
page.content: My dad is a coal miner who works on the coal face.My dad uses a machine, the machine cuts the coal.My dad works with 13 more men.My dad catches the bus to work.He works at Ireland colliery.It is about 2\ miles away.He doesn't like his job because it is dirty,dusty and damp.He likes the friendship and team work of the men. He wears a helmet,shirt,trousers and coat he also wears a battery on his belt to which his cap lamp is attached by a length of cable. He also wears a self rescuer attached to his belt that he takes with him, incase there is a fire.By breathing through it,it protects him from the deadly gases.From the pit bottom to the coal face it is 1 mile away.The height of the coal face is 3 ft high.
